title: [MC1.8+]原版Boss之炎魔
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2467295749 于 2015-5-30 15:44 编辑 

哈喽，大家好，又是我246{:10_492:}，昨天晚上逛BBS的时候看到一个小伙伴做了一个炎魔（原帖），但是感觉好像不太完善，没什么技能{:10_497:}。所以我就改了一下
图



















召唤阵

踩一下中间的钻石块
指令（输入后激活即可）

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-37 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-28 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-26 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/effect @e[type=Zombie,name=Fire]  12 9999 255"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-26 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_Boss2_min=1000] ~ ~ ~ execute @p ~ ~ ~ /title @a title {text:\\"警告！火球来袭\\",color:red}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-25 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_Boss2_min=1000] ~ ~ ~ execute @p ~ ~ ~ /summon Fireball ~ ~30 ~ {direction: [0.0,-1.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:7}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-22 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute destroy"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~-1 ~0 minecraft:nether_brick 0 {Invisible:1,CustomName:wxy}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~-1 ~2 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~1 ~2 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~41 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码



技能：1.隔一段时间召唤烈焰人
2.隔一段时间召唤火
3.隔一段时间召唤火球
